Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Hauna kuona (Iwe Muhammad (SAW)) here zvakaitwa naTenzi vako kuvaridzi venzou? (Mauto ane nzou akabva kuYemen achitungamirirwa na Abrahah Al-Ashram vane chinangwa chekuparadza Kaâ€™bah kuMakkah)
Havana kuita here kuti hurongwa hwavo hurasike (hushaye basa)
Uye vakavaita sokunge munda (usina chunhu) wakadyiwa (nemombe)
